 Vampirtron:
     "I have no group," He said, pausing, "So to speak. I'm a free agent. Although I must say, I am glad that a maximal came to pick me up. I do truely dislike the Predacons. Now as for my ship, I think it's in good order, I doubt that she'd fly again, but may be good for spare parts. I have no need for it, so you may have it."
     He walked over to the ship to give it a once over, "Although I don't think that we're going to be able to carry it. Perhaps you would get some help. My destress call was broadcast on a common channel. The Predacons might come to get me too. I don't want to fight right now."
  airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote: Nightlight::


"I'm Nightlight, I'm a maximal"replied the femme while she shook her 
hands "What's your group?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Lestat Lioncourt <thevmprlestat2000@y...> wrote:
> 
> OOC: How does he look? Umm...like seven feet tall, almost completly 
jet black. His swords are put into his back to make kinda a ridge 
looking thing. His eyes are bright blue, and teeth are very silver. 
He's very tough looking. 
> IC: Vampirtron:
>      "Yes, of course," He said to the bot that came to get him. He 
extended his right hand. "And who might you be? And if you don't mind 
me asking, to what group do you hold allegiance to?"
> 
> 
>

<P> Vampirtron:
<P>     "I have no group," He said, pausing, "So to speak. I'm a free agent. Although I must say, I am glad that a maximal came to pick me up. I do truely dislike the Predacons. Now as for my ship, I think it's in good order, I doubt that she'd fly again, but may be good for spare parts. I have no need for it, so you may have it."
<P>     He walked over to the ship to give it a once over, "Although I don't think that we're going to be able to carry it. Perhaps you would get some help. My destress call was broadcast on a common channel. The Predacons might come to get me too. I don't want to fight right now."
